Document.Focus: Heel pain and Achilles tendonitis - aftercare

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Heel pain and Achilles tendonitis - aftercare ?
QAPair.Answer: When you overuse the Achilles tendon, it can become swollen and painful near the bottom of the foot and cause heel pain. This is called Achilles tendonitis or Achilles tendinopathy.

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Heel pain and Achilles tendonitis - aftercare ?
QAPair.Answer: When you overuse the Achilles tendon, it can become swollen and painful near the bottom of the foot and cause heel pain. This is called Achilles tendonitis or Achilles tendinopathy.
